share.message: Check out Raymond Klanderman's Portfolio - Software Developer & AI Engineer

elevatorPitch.title: My Elevator Pitch
elevatorPitch.subtitle: Why Work With Me?
elevatorPitch.description: In this short video, I share my background, skills, and what makes me a unique candidate for your project or team.

paragraphs.0: Did you know many young people in Africa still struggle to access the right jobs, despite being highly skilled?
paragraphs.1: I'm Raymond Klanderman, a global AI Prompt Engineer, Fullstack Developer, and aspiring Data Analyst. I specialize in building smart digital tools that connect people to real opportunities—through the power of data and AI.
paragraphs.2: I recently led the development of AI Health Chat, a project that won 1st place in an innovation hackathon by using Grok to deliver personalized, privacy-focused health insights.
paragraphs.3: Now, I'm building Kazi Connect—an AI-powered job-matching platform that uses skill-based logic to pair youth with verified, scam-free jobs.
paragraphs.4: I turn data into decisions, and LLMs into accessible solutions—and I'm excited to collaborate with mission-driven teams creating real-world impact.

profile.title: Professional Profile
profile.description: As a passionate Software Developer, AI Prompt Engineer, and Cloud Enthusiast, I thrive on designing smart, scalable solutions that solve real-world challenges. My expertise spans full-stack development, AI integration, and cloud computing, empowering me to craft applications that are both innovative and impactful. Fueled by an insatiable curiosity, I'm always diving deeper into AI deployment and cloud technologies, eager to push the limits of what technology can achieve. I'd love to connect, collaborate on exciting projects, or explore the latest in tech—let's make something extraordinary together!

sauti.name: Sauti ya Wanainchi
sauti.description: A comprehensive platform that enables communities to provide feedback, report issues, and engage with local officials. Features include real-time updates, geolocation mapping, and analytics dashboard.

aiHealth.name: AI Health Chat
aiHealth.description: An intelligent healthcare consultation application that uses advanced AI to provide preliminary medical guidance. Built with a secure Supabase backend for user data and medical history storage. Features conversational UI and symptom analysis.

dutch.name: Dutch Learning App
dutch.description: A gamified educational app designed to make learning Dutch engaging and effective. Features include pronunciation guides, vocabulary building exercises, grammar lessons, and progress tracking with personalized learning paths.

civic.name: Civic Alert Lite
civic.description: A mobile application that empowers citizens to report and track civic issues in their communities. Integrated with geolocation services, push notifications, and administrative dashboards for local authorities to manage reported issues.

kpesa.name: Kpesa
kpesa.description: A comprehensive financial management application for personal and business use. Features include expense tracking, budget planning, financial insights, multi-currency support, and secure cloud backup of financial data.

kaziConnect.name: Kazi Connect
kaziConnect.description: An innovative job marketplace that uses artificial intelligence to match job seekers with suitable opportunities. Features include CV analysis, skill assessment, automated application tracking, and personalized job recommendations based on user profile and preferences.

alx.name: ALX Data Analytics Program
alx.description1: Gaining expertise in data cleaning, visualization, and interpretation using SQL, Power BI, and Tableau.
alx.description2: Applying Agile methodologies for collaborative problem-solving.

worldquant_cv.name: Applied AI Lab: Deep Learning for Computer Vision
worldquant_cv.description1: Mastering deep learning frameworks and computer vision techniques
worldquant_cv.description2: Building and deploying real-world AI applications

worldquant_ds.name: Applied Data Science Lab
worldquant_ds.description1: Advanced data analysis and machine learning techniques

code_in_place.name: Code in Place: Introduction to Programming with Python
code_in_place.description1: Intensive Python programming course from Stanford University
code_in_place.description2: Completed diagnostic assessment and final project with distinction

mua_diploma.name: Diploma in Information Communication Technology
mua_diploma.description2: Focus on modern software development and IT infrastructure
